entangled.entangled_block.info.ranged_sa: Can be bound to blocks in the same dimension up to %d blocks away
entangled.entangled_block.info.infinite_: Can be bound to blocks in the same dimension
entangled.entangled_block.info.ranged_ot: Can be bound to blocks up to %d blocks away or to blocks in other dimensions
entangled.entangled_block.info.infinite_: Can be bound to other blocks
entangled.entangled_block.self: Can't bind a block to itself!
entangled.entangled_block.wrong_dimensio: The targeted block must be in the same dimension!
entangled.entangled_block.too_far: The targeted block is too far away!
entangled.entangled_binder.info: Can bind entangled blocks to other blocks
entangled.entangled_binder.info.target.u: Linked to a block in the %4$s at (%1$d, %2$d, %3$d)
